item.description:
Organizer: William
Contact: http://photo.meetup.c...
Audience: All NEPN members!

Congregational Church is one of the must sees in Henniker, along with the stone bridge and covered bridge, Hillsborough also has many things to offer, such as dam, antique truck graveyard (unless they've moved it) and several mortarless stone bridges that were built in the mid-1800's by Scottish Emigrants

I'll be posting some of the Pictures I've done in the past from this area...keep in mind this is a casual day trip, if enough interest is shown I'll extend it to two days

also depending on how many show I will be looking for people able to carpool, as I have a good size truck, I could transport any gear in my vehicle

would also like to set a designated meeting point where we could all meet before hand and then drive up suggestions as to where are welcome

another thing if needed I can bump the number of guests up as well for this, plan on meeting up to head to the locations late morning (11am'ish...bring coffee ;o))

thnx,
~Will

*like to add that the final destination for this trip is Hillsborough and next month there will be a Balloon Festival in this town (July 13 - 15, 2007)
item.name: Day trip to Henniker and Hillsborough NH
